results.title: The metformin administration on pancreatic tissue damage in metastatic rat prostate cancer and STZ induced diabetes model.
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration on @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010182 @@@pancreatic tissue damage@@@ in metastatic @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@ induced @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Koroglu P, Ertik O, Bulan OK, Yanardag R. The metformin administration on pancreatic tissue damage in metastatic rat prostate cancer and STZ induced diabetes model. J Mol Histol. 2025 Jun 21;56(4):201. PMID: 40542925

results.title: Metformin alleviates long-term high-fructose diet-induced skeletal muscle insulin resistance in rats by regulating purine nucleotide cycle.
results.text_hl: Results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly ameliorated features of @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@, including body weight, Lee's index, @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@, @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin intolerance@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010182 @@@pancreatic damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Cheng J, Xu L, Yu Q, Lin G, Ma X, Li M, Guan F, Liu Y, Huang X, Xie J, Chen J, Su Z, Li Y. Metformin alleviates long-term high-fructose diet-induced skeletal muscle insulin resistance in rats by regulating purine nucleotide cycle. Eur J Pharmacol. 2022 Oct 15;933():175234. PMID: 36058289

results.title: An Overview of the Evidence and Mechanism of Drug-Herb Interactions Between Propolis and Pharmaceutical Drugs
results.text_hl: The strong antioxidant activity of @CHEMICAL_Propolis @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011429 @@@propolis@@@ also strengthened the therapeutic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in attenuating @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010182 @@@pancreatic damage@@@, as well as mitigating oxidative stress in the liver, kidney, and testis.

citations.NLM: Hossain S, Yousaf M, Liu Y, Chang D, Zhou X. An Overview of the Evidence and Mechanism of Drug-Herb Interactions Between Propolis and Pharmaceutical Drugs Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():876183. PMID: 35444531

results.title: Treatment with incretins does not increase the risk of pancreatic diseases compared to older anti-hyperglycaemic drugs, when added to metformin: real world evidence in people with Type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: Treatment with incretins does not increase the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010182 @@@pancreatic diseases@@@ compared to older anti-hyperglycaemic drugs, when added to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@: real world evidence in people with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 diabetes@@@.

results.title: Assessment of Pharmacological Responses to an Anti-diabetic Drug in a New Obese Type 2 Diabetic Rat Model
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment led to maintained good glycemic control and improved @DISEASE_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009422 @@@neuropathy@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010182 @@@pancreatic lesions@@@ in female SDT fatty @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: The Influence of Metformin on Serum Carbohydrate Antigen 19-9 (CA 19-9) Levels in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients.
results.text_hl: Results: Mean CA 19-9 level was 18.99+-4.30 U/ml in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group as compared to 30.49+-5.61 U/ml in non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group (p<0.001).

citations.NLM: Ankit BS, Agrawal R, Gadhwal A, Chahar C, Agrawal RP. The Influence of Metformin on Serum Carbohydrate Antigen 19-9 (CA 19-9) Levels in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients. J Assoc Physicians India. 2018 Mar;66(3):38-41. PMID: 30341867
